SELECT info.id, info.title, info.summary, info.is_top, info.traffic, info.createtime, content.content FROM article_info info JOIN article_content content ON content.article_id = info.id WHERE info.del_flag = 0
and ( info.title like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%') or info.summary like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%') )
